name: Burst Leather Cuff
description:
The Burst leather cuff begins as a design that we burn into a large piece of leather, then the cuff is formed, dyed and sealed by Ricky or Katrina in our Austin, TX studio. The dye process can be a bit unpredictable, expect yours to be unique! 

Your Espacio cuff is conditioned and sealed, however we recommend keeping it dry. You may want to condition the leather occasionally (as long as you're oiling up your boots!) to keep your cuff soft & moisturized.

Great for the special fly gal or handsome gent in your life!

Hand dyed genuine leather cuff, brass closure. 1" wide.

• 11 colors
• 2 sizes

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your bracelet to be made. Rush available at an extra charge.

name: Diamond Leather Necklace
description:
This is a staple in our wardrobe! The Diamond leather necklace begins as a design that we burn into a large piece of leather, then the pendants are dyed and sealed by Ricky or Katrina in our Austin, TX studio. The dye process can be a bit unpredictable, expect yours to be unique!

Your Espacio necklace is conditioned and sealed, however we recommend keeping it dry. You may want to condition the leather occasionally (as long as you're oiling up your boots!) to keep your necklace soft & moisturized.

Great for the special fly gal or handsome gent in your life!

Hand dyed genuine leather necklace. 27" long.

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your necklace to be made. Rush available at an extra charge.

name: Brogue Leather Wrap Bracelet
description:
The Brogue leather wrap is an homage to wingtip shoes. Perfect for the hipster in your life. The Brogue leather bracelet begins as a large piece of leather, the design is burnt, then the bracelet is washed, formed, dyed and sealed by Ricky or Katrina in our Austin, TX studio. The dye process can be a bit unpredictable, expect yours to be unique!

Your Espacio bracelet is conditioned and sealed, however we recommend keeping it dry. You may want to condition the leather occasionally (as long as you're oiling up your boots!) to keep your bracelet soft & moisturized.

Hand dyed genuine leather single wrap bracelet, brass closure. 3/8" wide.

• 3 colors
• 2 sizes

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your bracelet to be made. Rush available at an extra charge.

name: Opium Leather Cuff
description:
We love this cuff. The Opium leather cuff begins as a design that we burn into a large piece of leather, then the cuff is washed, formed, dyed and sealed by Ricky or Katrina in our Austin, TX studio. The dye process can be a bit unpredictable, expect yours to be unique!

Your Espacio cuff is conditioned and sealed, however we recommend keeping it dry. You may want to condition the leather occasionally (as long as you're oiling up your boots!) to keep your cuff soft & moisturized.

Great for the special fly gal in your life! We only make it in the lady sizes right now, let us know if you're a hipster gent in need of a larger size.

Hand dyed genuine leather cuff, brass closure. 1" wide.

• 11 colors 

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your bracelet to be made. Rush available at an extra charge.

name: Respira Silk Wrap – Plum
description: Double Feature! Wear as a (6) wrap bracelet or single or double wrap necklace. Combine multiple colors for a stacked look! Order 2 or more enter COMBO at checkout for $5 off. 42" Your Espacio Respira bracelet is delivered on an inspirational message card. Hand dyed & sewn silk, magnetic clasp. Keep silk dry, will stretch if wet. Handmade in Austin, Texas

The dye process can be a bit unpredictable, expect yours to be unique!

Your Espacio cuff is conditioned and sealed, however we recommend keeping it dry. You may want to condition the leather occasionally (as long as you're oiling up your boots!) to keep your bracelet soft & moisturized.
